title: E-Commerce Platform
description: Modern e-commerce platform with real-time inventory management and payment integration
detailedDescription: A comprehensive e-commerce solution featuring real-time inventory tracking, secure payment processing, order management, and customer analytics dashboard. Built with scalability in mind to handle thousands of concurrent users.

title: Mobile Banking App
description: Secure mobile banking application with biometric authentication and instant transfers
detailedDescription: A feature-rich mobile banking application offering secure transactions, biometric authentication, real-time notifications, bill payments, and comprehensive account management. Deployed on both iOS and Android platforms.

title: Healthcare Management System
description: Comprehensive healthcare management system for hospitals and clinics
detailedDescription: An integrated healthcare management system featuring patient records, appointment scheduling, prescription management, billing, and reporting. Compliant with healthcare data protection regulations.

title: Logistics Tracking Platform
description: Real-time logistics and fleet management platform with GPS tracking
detailedDescription: A sophisticated logistics platform providing real-time GPS tracking, route optimization, delivery scheduling, and comprehensive analytics for fleet management. Integrates with multiple third-party services.

title: Social Media Application
description: Feature-rich social networking app with real-time messaging and content sharing
detailedDescription: A modern social media application featuring real-time messaging, photo and video sharing, stories, live streaming, and advanced privacy controls. Built for high performance and scalability.

title: Online Education Platform
description: Interactive learning platform with video courses and progress tracking
detailedDescription: A comprehensive online learning platform featuring video courses, interactive quizzes, progress tracking, certificates, and instructor dashboards. Supports multiple payment methods and subscription models.
